welcome.p1: Welcome to my website! My name is Eugene Ohvatuk (nickname SBV) and I've been doing web development for more than a year. My main technology stack is React. I try to create web applications that are beautiful, easy to use and as efficient as possible.
welcome.p2: On this website I present my work and experiments in web development. Here you can read about my projects and learn more about how I work.
welcome.p3: Be assured that no personal information is collected on my site. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me by email ohvatuki@gmail.com.
welcome.p4: Thanks for visiting my site, I hope you find a lot of interesting things here!

content.p1: My name is Eugene Ohvatuk, and at the moment I'm finishing my college studies in the field of IT software. Web development I started more than a year ago and during this time I have some experience in this area.
content.p2: I am proficient in HTML, CSS (as well as the SASS preprocessor) and JavaScript, including ES6 syntax. In the last six months I've been writing applications using React and Redux libraries. I am constantly improving my skills and am currently learning TypeScript.
content.p3: However, my work is not limited to the frontend. I also have experience with the server side of applications using Node.js and the Express framework. I am also familiar with SQL, and I have experience creating databases and running SQL queries (I used PostgreSQL for my purposes).
content.p4: I'm ready to apply my knowledge and web development skills to new projects and continue my professional growth. I'm looking for a Frontend Developer position with a company where I can gain new experience and learn more about modern web development technologies. I look forward to discussing my qualification and joining your team.

404.message: Error. This page does not exist.
